title: Representative Learning Design (RLD)-Based Tennis Training Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic tennis techniques and understanding of game rules
context.additional_context: VR simulation tools accessible via smartphones, with training tasks designed to mimic competitive environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design training tasks by applying the seven criteria of the RPAT assessment tool
Learners achieve over 80% information-action linkage fidelity in simulation environments resembling actual competitions
Learners can explain over 75% of the impact of training design on performance improvement through summative evaluation

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
